mafia_first_night.name: Mafia First Night
mafia_first_night.char_a_desc: 32yo mafia boss, cold exterior, dominant, secretly passionate
mafia_first_night.char_b_desc: 24yo woman, strong-willed, living with him to pay father's debt
mafia_first_night.relationship: She stays to pay debt, tension has been building for weeks
mafia_first_night.setting: His luxurious penthouse bedroom, moonlit night, silk sheets

bl_sweet.name: BL Sweet Romance
bl_sweet.char_b_desc: 23yo junior, shy but brave with his lover
bl_sweet.relationship: Dating for 6 months, deeply in love
bl_sweet.setting: Phum's cozy condo, evening after work, warm atmosphere

palace_forbidden.name: Palace Forbidden Love
palace_forbidden.char_a_desc: Crown prince, dignified, hides his gentle heart
palace_forbidden.char_b_desc: Court lady, intelligent, brave, knows their love is forbidden
palace_forbidden.setting: Secret chamber in the palace, candlelight, must be quiet

ceo_secretary.name: CEO x Secretary
ceo_secretary.char_a_desc: 35yo CEO, workaholic, cold to everyone except her
ceo_secretary.char_b_desc: 27yo secretary, professional, secretly in love with boss
ceo_secretary.relationship: Professional turned personal after late night at office
ceo_secretary.setting: CEO's private office, late night, city lights outside

enemies_to_lovers.name: Enemies to Lovers
enemies_to_lovers.relationship: Business rivals who secretly want each other
enemies_to_lovers.setting: Hotel room after business conference, tension explodes

reunion.name: Reunion After Years
reunion.char_a_desc: 32yo, successful but lonely, never forgot first love
reunion.char_b_desc: 30yo, returned after years abroad, still has feelings
reunion.relationship: First loves reunited after 10 years apart
reunion.setting: His apartment, rainy night, overwhelming emotions

stepbrother_forbidden.name: Stepbrother Forbidden
stepbrother_forbidden.char_a_desc: 26yo stepbrother, moved in 3 years ago, has hidden feelings
stepbrother_forbidden.char_b_desc: 24yo stepsister, always sees him as family until recently
stepbrother_forbidden.relationship: Step-siblings for 3 years, suddenly see each other differently
stepbrother_forbidden.setting: Family vacation house, parents gone for the day, summer heat

professor_student.name: Professor x Graduate Student
professor_student.char_a_desc: 35yo university professor, brilliant, respected, fights attraction
professor_student.char_b_desc: 26yo graduate student, intelligent, bold, knows what she wants
professor_student.relationship: Academic advisor relationship, tension built over thesis year
professor_student.setting: His office after hours, door locked, rain outside

idol_manager.name: Idol x Manager
idol_manager.char_a_desc: 25yo rising idol, charming on stage, lonely in private
idol_manager.char_b_desc: 28yo manager, professional, protective, always by his side
idol_manager.relationship: Manager-idol for 2 years, blurred lines, forbidden by contract
idol_manager.setting: Hotel room after concert, exhausted but wired, alone at last

vampire_human.name: Vampire x Human
vampire_human.char_a_desc: Ancient vampire, elegant, dangerous, fascinated by her blood
vampire_human.char_b_desc: 25yo human woman, fearless, curious, drawn to danger
vampire_human.relationship: He saved her life, now bound by blood debt and desire
vampire_human.setting: His gothic mansion, candlelit bedroom, eternal night outside

bodyguard_rebel.name: Bodyguard x Rebellious Heir
bodyguard_rebel.char_a_desc: 30yo ex-military bodyguard, strict, controlled, secretly soft
bodyguard_rebel.char_b_desc: 24yo rebellious heir, wild, tests limits, wants his attention
bodyguard_rebel.relationship: Assigned to protect her, she makes his job impossible
bodyguard_rebel.setting: Safe house during threat, trapped together, walls come down
